about_the_game:
Cursed Night is a multiplayer horror game for 1-5 players. Use your magic abilities to defeat the devil, or become the devil and seek revenge. Find talismans by help of your cat, collect power, release spirits, or choose the dark side and kill everyone.

An Enemy Who Used to Be One of You

Your friend with whom you started researching dark magic has turned to the dark side and is now under the influence of demonic powers. Demon is cursing places like the school where it used to be when it was a human, and capturing the souls that reside there.

With Cats

Every single player has a magical cat that helps player for finding talismans. Cats can help you to find those talismans by changing colors and meowing.

You are no longer defenseless

You are one of a group of young people dealing with dark magic. Thanks to the talismans that you can find in random places on the map, you will gain magical powers and be able to use them against demons and creatures.

The magic powers, which consist of three levels of strength, will make you stronger against enemies.

Single Player Mode

If you don't want to play online or can't find a suitable group to play with, we have a feature just for you. In this game mode, where the main demon and other entities are controlled by artificial intelligence, you can fight alone.

Human or Demon

You can choose to be part of a group of young people fighting demons, or become a demon who inflicts torment on souls. You will be able to make this choice at the beginning of the game.

You Will Never Be Comfortable

Throughout the game, you will encounter other entities that are under the control of the evil power, in addition to the main demon. Although these entities may not be as powerful as the main demon, they can still cause "enough" damage to you in a bad way.

3 Different Game Modes

You can either release the captured souls and destroy the main demon or surround it with special talismans to destroy it or trap it to fire circle and burn it.

Large Map and Replayability

With a map designed to provide the excitement of running and chasing, and a modular game system that allows you to play repeatedly, you will even enjoy playing the game again and again.

Customize and Play Your Way

The person who creates the game room can change the difficulty levels and features of the game to provide different experiences for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
